The Menagerie Network Experience

Home to the most amazing animals

  • Save 10% when booking online
    Know when you’re planning to visit? Book online to save 10% and take advantage of family and group discounts!
  • Become part of the Menagerie Family
    Enjoy unlimited annual visits to any Menagerie Network Zoo plus a host of other benefits. From only £63.
  • Visit the online Gift shop
    Every product you purchase supports the charity and this means that when you shop with us you are also working for wildlife.

Learn more

1

Book your tickets

As a non-profit organisation, including a voluntary 10% donation in your ticket purchase makes a big difference and helps us continue our vital conservation work around the world.

2

Plan your day

Plan your trip to any one of our zoos. Save time by getting directions when travelling by car, train or bus. Opening times vary at each zoo, so make sure to check the specific times for your trip.

3

Shop for gifts

You won't go home empty handed, with over 3000 unique and amazing animal-themed homeware, toys and gifts available for purchase; all while supporting our work with wildlife.

Every Wanted to Adopt an Animal?

By adopting an animal with the Menagerie Network you are helping support our conservation work worldwide, as well as help care for our animals at every single one of our zoos. In return you will receive a fantastic gift pack which can be personalised.
